title: Blended Learning Program Utilizing Podcasts for Nursing Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Basic Nursing Theories and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment for corporate nursing managers to strengthen job competencies, supporting flexible learning through personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can explain core nursing management theories using podcasts with over 80% comprehension.
Learners can integrate podcasts and online materials to propose three strategies applicable to real-world nursing scenarios.
Learners can demonstrate the effectiveness of podcast-based learning by achieving at least 75% proficiency in formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
